effects.tier1: 14 lightning damage; the lightning spreads 1 square; I<3 dazed (save ends)
effects.tier2: 19 lightning damage; the lightning spreads 2 squares; I<4 dazed (save ends)
effects.tier3: 23 lightning damage; the lightning spreads 3 squares; I<5 dazed (save ends)

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The spread is the distance the charge arcs from a target to nearby enemies. Each enemy within spread takes 5 lightning damage.
The lighting spread increases by 2 squares. Additionally, any creature who takes lightning damage from this ability and who has M<4 is slowed until the end of their next turn.

items.name: Overcharge
items.target: Each war dog in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target shifts up to their speed and can make a free strike that deals an extra 5 lightning damage.

items.name: Thunderstruck
items.trigger: An enemy within distance deals damage to the taxiarch.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: After the ability is resolved, the target is teleported up to 5 squares and is thunderstruck (save ends). A thunderstruck creature has lightning weakness 5, and the taxiarch gains an edge on power rolls against them.
At the end of each of their turns, the taxiarch can take 15 damage to end one effect on them that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Slide 5, and if the the target has M<4, they fall prone.

items.name: Conductor of Combat
items.target: Each war dog in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target shifts up to their speed, then can make a free strike or use a maneuver.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target makes an Agility test.
effects.tier1: 18 lightning damage; the target is thunderstruck (save ends)
effects.tier2: 14 lightning damage; the target is thunderstruck (EoT)

effects.effect: See Thunderstruck. Additionally, until the end of the encounter, any enemy who moves within 3 squares of the taxiarch for the first time in a round or starts their turn there takes 3 lightning damage.
